title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Icon Button
content:
Specify the icon attribute value to display the icon as an icon button.

Icon Icon Usage

Import the required Icon from @opentiny/vue-icon, initialize the Icon component in the data function, and assign a value to an attribute. Use the icon attribute to reference the template. Use native-type to set the form type of the button and image buttons. This attribute is used only when type is set to button or image. The optional values of this attribute are button / submit / reset.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Text button
content: Set the type attribute to text, which is a text button. You can set the content to be displayed at the tag child level or through the text attribute.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Button Fillet
content: The round attribute is used to set whether to round the button.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Picture button
content: Embeds the img tag with the default slot usage and introduces the image.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Theme Style
content: You can set different theme styles through the type attribute, including primary, success, info, warning, danger, and text.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Display Loading
content: Set loading to true to display the style being loaded.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Dimension
content: Use the size attribute to set the button size, including large, medium, small, and mini. If this parameter is not set, the default size is used.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Round Button
content: Set the circle attribute to true. The button is displayed as a round button.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Simple button
content: Set the plain attribute to true. The button is displayed as a simple button.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Prevent repeated submission of forms
content: You can use the reset-time attribute to set the duration for which the button is disabled. The default duration is 1000 ms. This parameter can be used to prevent repeated submission of the form when you click the button continuously.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Default Focus
content: The autofocus attribute button is displayed in the focused state by default.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Event
content:
Click event of the

button. In this example, a message is displayed when a button is clicked.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.

title: Dynamic Disable Button
content: After disabled is set to true, the button can be disabled.
findIntroStr: Common operation buttons, including default buttons, icon buttons, picture buttons, and drop-down buttons.
